com.impossibl.stencil.api.impl

Class URLTemplateSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.impossibl.stencil.api.impl.URLTemplateSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TemplateSource, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class URLTemplateSource
extends Object
implements TemplateSource
    Template source based on any URL. Uses either the ETAG header of the URL it builds, and caches, an MD5 for the URL.
    Author:
    kdubb

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      URLTemplateSource(URL url)
      Constructs a template source for the given url
